prompts.prompt: List all Microsoft 365 licenses (SKUs) available in our tenant, including their names and usage statistics.

template.name: list-all-licenses
template.title: List all licenses
template.description: Lists all available Microsoft 365 or Azure AD licenses (subscribed SKUs), showing SKU names and key usage statistics.

prompts.prompt: Show all users with at least one assigned license, including their display name, username, and assigned license SKUs.

template.name: users-with-licenses
template.title: Users with licenses
template.description: Shows all users who have at least one Microsoft 365/Azure AD license assigned, including their display name and the SKUs.

prompts.prompt: For the user with username {userName}, show all assigned licenses and which service plans are active.

template.name: user-license-details
template.title: User license details
template.description: Displays the full license and service plan details for a specific user.

arguments.name: userName
arguments.description: The username or user principal name of the user.

prompts.prompt: List all users who currently have no Microsoft 365 or Azure AD licenses assigned.

template.name: list-unlicensed-users
template.title: List unlicensed users
template.description: Lists all users without any Microsoft 365 or Azure AD licenses assigned.
